00041 #include "egs_base_geometry.h"
00042 #include "egs_geometry_tester.h"
00043 #include "egs_input.h"
00044 #include "egs_functions.h"
00045 
00046 #include <iostream>
00047 using namespace std;
00048 
00049 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00050 
00051     if (argc < 2) {
00052         egsFatal("Usage: %s input_file\n",argv[0]);
00053     }
00054 
00055     EGS_Input input;
00056     input.setContentFromFile(argv[1]);
00057     //input.print(0,cout);
00058     EGS_BaseGeometry *g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry(&input);
00059     if (!g) {
00060         egsFatal("\nGot a null geometry? Check your input file\n\n");
00061     }
00062     EGS_BaseGeometry::describeGeometries();
00063 
00064     EGS_GeometryTester *tester = EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester(&input);
00065 
00066     tester->testInside(g);
00067     tester->testInsideTime(g);
00068     tester->testHownear(20,g);
00069     tester->testHownearTime(g);
00070     tester->testHowfar(g);
00071     tester->testHowfarTime(g);
00072 
00073     delete tester;
00074 
00075     return 0;
00076 
00077 }
